name: df-dec
body: |- wceq(cdc(c0, c1), co(co(co(nat9, caddc, nat1), cmul, c0), caddc, c1))
comment: Define the "decimal constructor", which is used to build up "decimal integers" or "numeric terms" in base ` 1 0 ` . For example, ` ( ; ; ; 1 0 0 0 + ; ; ; 2 0 0 0 ) = ; ; ; 3 0 0 0 ` ~ 1kp2ke3k . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Apr-2015.) (Revised by AV, 1-Aug-2021.)
